Skill.label: Flame Wall (Shoot Rolling Magma into this)
^7^5If you don't like Rolling Magma Try HFT
Frostblink (You can also use Arcane Surge Here)
^4Level all gems to max level Except for
^5Lifetap - ^5^7This should only be maxed on RF&FT
^5Arcane Surge ^7- Keep lvl 1 to trigger easily
Flame Wall (If your damage feels good drop this)
^1Do not forget to do Library Quest for Fire Trap!
^1You want to level Firetrap till your RF Swap
Frostblink (Links are not required but help)
Frostblink (alternative setup but more link starve
Stone for HP Regen | Lightning for Damage
Wave of conviction (There is no way you need this)
^1You can find it in Act 8 ^2The Wings of Vastiri
Stone Golem - I drop this when it starts dying
Wave of conviction Or Master of Fire OR Gloves
^5<< By Gloves I mean Eater Influence Exposure >>
Molten Shell - Lifetap prob not needed
^1You will need to change Pantheon to Brine King
^5For Combustion you need flat fire abyss jewel
^5Or an unveiled fire damage on ring
^5<< Eater of Worlds Gloves give Fire Exposure >>
^4<< Bloodrage is Optional for Frenzy Charges >>
^0^4<< Call to arms removed so warcry not needed >
^5<< Eater of Worlds Gloves give Fire Exposure >>
^4<< Bloodrage is Optional for Frenzy Charges >>
^0^4<< Call to arms removed so warcry not needed >

Spec.title: Level 12-30 Getting your big auras setup.
Level 55-71 Dropping VIT and Swapping in Malev
Level 95+ Double Cluster Setup + Aegis Melding

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
For any potential questions or if you feel you get stuck at all don't forget to check out my RF WIKI ^5 Pohx.Net ^7
Few notes for people who want to min-max a bit
For players wanting to get 90% all res. You can elevate the cold res on gloves for +1 Max which puts you to 87 All. You can also Min-Max your Chest influenced to hit a purity of ice breakpoint on aura effect (Every 25%) This will grant you +2 Max res putting you at 89% There are other ways to do this such as using brutal restraint or Impossible Escape.
You can use a mavens Jewel Impossible Escape at CI/Lethe Shade/Supreme Ego
There are many watchers eye combos that work. You can check my website for a list of all usable ones.
There are not too many Forbidden Flesh & Flames and one of the good ones is Hierophant % mana eff but it's really expensive.
Mage blood is very good for the build but I will not be making Mirror Tier PoB's
Brutal Restraint should be used in templar area by divine judgement.
For Cluster Jewel Advice Watch this video --> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N_KQG0xvNj0 Then watch it again --> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N_KQG0xvNj0

Items.Item: Rarity: MAGIC Smouldering Driftwood Sceptre Crafted: true Prefix: {range:0.965}SpellAddedFireDamage2_ Suffix: None Quality: 20 Sockets: B-B-B LevelReq: 8 Implicits: 1 {tags:elemental_damage,damage,elemental}10% increased Elemental Damage Sockets: Sockets: Adds 8 to 14 Fire Damage to Spells ^4This leveling portion requires you to use a recipe to faceroll the campaign. ^4To get started make sure you collect Iron & Ruby Rings. ^6Next you're going to vendor a Magic Sceptre or Wand with a white ruby ring and an Alteration. ^6This will get you the modifier that you see on the weapon right now ^6Later on you will turn the white ruby ring into magic or rare for higher tier affix. ^6but not at the start or you will be unable to use the piece of gear ^5Red Gem + Iron Ring sold to the vendor = Ruby Ring
